name: Mango IT Solutions
description:
Mango IT Solutions, previously referred as AnyLinuxWork, is an ISO 9001 certified web company working exclusively on PHP-MySQL and mobile development. We specialize in web applications including eCommerce, shopping carts, CMS, LMS, rental, custom and SAAS applications; server management, and mobile applications. We work on Frameworks/CMS like:
1. Zend 2.0, CodeIgniter, CakePHP, Symfony, Laravel
2. WordPress, Joomla, Drupal
3. Magento 1.x & 2.x, WooCommerce
4. Mobile App Development with Android and iOS
Mango IT Solutions has been catering to a wide client base across the world since 2006 thanks to 60+ IT professionals team working under one roof. We have projects from 20-1000 man-days of work, including 1-10 member dedicated teams. We offer end to end web development services including designing, coding, mobile development and server management.
With 98%+ successful project completion rate, we generate 60%+ repeat business. We are an exclusive PHP-MySQL reliable, professional, timely, and communicative and value for money provider. Please visit MangoitsolutionsÂ for portfolio details and client testimonials.
MangoIT is among top 10% providers on Upwork and has clocked 200,000+ hours with 97% job success rate and nearly zero dispute. We understand the rules and regulations of the platform and in addition to work screen-shot tracking, we offer project monitoring on Asana, BaseCamp, staging servers, and daily email reporting, and are available on Skype/Hangout or phone for client communication. Our team members are always updated with the latest PHP technologies/versions and are among top rated providers.
